thread.title: James Earl Jones to Host New "Voices In America" Segment on the Creation of Bike Paths for Public Television
thread.title_full: James Earl Jones to Host New "Voices In America" Segment on the Creation of Bike Paths for Public Television - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: James Earl Jones to Host New "Voices In America" Segment on the Creation of Bike Paths for Public Television
text:
New content is being developed for the popular program to educate on current events.
(PRWEB) October 12, 2015
Voices In America with their host, James Earl Jones, will be developing the newest episode focusing on municipal bike paths and cycling safety in the United States. The segment presents a history of cycling, its growth and popularity, and the unique culture that surrounds it.
The popularity of cycling has increased dramatically over the past decade as a sport, recreation activity, and mode of transportation. As such, there have been numerous improvements to cycling equipment throughout the years, to ensure the safety and enjoyment of riders, at any level of activity. Cyclists have also been able to enjoy significant growth in municipal bike paths, thanks to community leaders who recognize the benefits of a cycling population. The segment will also showcase some of the best bike paths in the country, and the influence of the biking culture on the nation.
“Voices In America” is distributed to the Public Television stations all across the nation as an independent production. It is aired at the discretion of the stations and is not a production of PBS or APT or in any way affiliated with these organizations.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13015463.htm
